subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Times and ESPN quoted Luke Walton’s agent as saying that the Lakers had reached an agreement to re-sign Walton, a free-agent forward. Walton’s contract will be worth $30 million over six years, according to Lon Babby, the agent. Walton, 27, averaged 11.4 points, 5.0 rebounds and 4.3 assists last season.
